summary: Provides a wrapper class that encapsulates an ONNX Runtime model, handling its initialization, creation from configuration objects, and loading from pretrained checkpoints to deliver a ready-to-use inference session, with fallback behavior when the ONNX backend is unavailable.
business_intent: Enable seamless integration of ONNX-based inference within the library, allowing developers and endâ€‘users to load, configure, and run ONNX models without worrying about backend availability, thereby simplifying deployment of diffusion models in production or research environments.
